meanings.sent1: She has a hubbly personality, always smiling and welcoming.
meanings.sent2: The hubbly group of friends enjoyed a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent3: At the hubbly gathering, everyone shared stories and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her hubbly nature brightened up even the gloomiest days.
meanings.sent5: The hubbly atmosphere at the party made everyone feel at ease.

meanings.definition: Hubbly (noun): a social gathering or party
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood block party was a hubbly event with music and food.
meanings.sent2: Let's organize a hubbly for your birthday to celebrate with friends.
meanings.sent3: The hubbly was filled with laughter and good vibes all night long.
meanings.sent4: The hubbly buzzed with excitement as guests arrived one by one.
meanings.sent5: Join us at the hubbly this weekend for a fun time with friends.

meanings.definition: Hubbly (adverb): in a friendly and sociable manner
meanings.sent1: She greeted everyone hubbly, with a warm smile and kind words.
meanings.sent2: The team worked hubbly together to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: He waved hubbly to his neighbors as he walked down the street.
meanings.sent4: The children played hubbly in the park, sharing toys and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The waitress served hubbly, making sure all customers were happy.
